# UIPageViewController.SpineLocation.none

**Case**

No spine.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Discussion

This spine location is not valid if the transition style is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewController/TransitionStyle-swift.enum/pageCurl].

## Constants

- **UIPageViewController.SpineLocation.min**: Spine at the left or top edge of the screen.
- **UIPageViewController.SpineLocation.mid**: Spine in the middle or the screen.
- **UIPageViewController.SpineLocation.max**: Spine at the right or bottom edge of the screen.
